to the guy asking about Kotor download. i wouldn't even bother with the pc version unless your using an older graphics cards. for some reason the game likes to crash with newer systems. kotor 2 didn't have this problem. all i know is when i upgraded my card my kotor crashes. i googles the issue and it told me it was the newer card not wanting to process the game.

and to the guy claiming this is just a demo. the demo version you get is the full version. it just unlocks everything when you impute a proper product key. alot of games do this, which is one reason they are so easy to pirate.

To all of you who has problems with Cd-key:
The image you copyed from the "Skidrow" into the game folder, you must use this image when you start the game, then you don't have to use CD-key or anything:)

Has crashing issue while Alt + Tab switching to both Chrome and/or FireFox to check M&B: Fire and Sword Wiki.  Also gets "Program Stopped Error" randomly while loading combat.  ...learned to spam F12 for quicksave soon after.
  Some improvements over quests, but looks very much alike Mount & Blade: Warband with a gun Mod.  Polish and Moscovites Factions both share same yellow color, thus confusing gameplay in Map screen.  The list of flaws are endless as of my five hours of play.

A pretty good game nonetheless, counting the fact that it's free, cheers to SKIDROW.

... after 17 hours of play I found major problem with this upload.  This is 1.138 version, and there are major bugs that need addressing.  Most annoying bug is the fact that your troops do not gain exp, thus never level up to stronger units.  This issue was fixed in version 1.139, but once again this is 1.138 with such annoyance.
